page.title: 02A SUMMARY OF THE BLOCK 2.
page.content: A new road is planned to by-pass New Waltham,and also provide another route into Grimsby.The new road into Grimsby will be built on the disused railway. Although there is mostly farmland and some residential areas in the block there is a small industrial estate. In the north of the area is Weelsby Woods, a public park. It has large open grassed areas and extensive mature mixed native tree areas. The woods are a popular walking area but the grassed areas are often spoiled by dog faeces. A Picnic area is being developed which is proving very popular along with a 'keep fit' area. Private housing in the north of the block is dominated by bungalows and there are extensive council house developments.
